sections.text:
79-1080.Class IV and V school districts; school tax; how payable.

All taxes collected for the benefit of the public schools in Class IV and V school districts shall be paid in money and shall be subject to the order of the board of education.

SourceLaws 1891, c. 45, § 23, p. 325;R.S.1913, § 7029;C.S.1922, § 6660;C.S.1929, § 79-2723;R.S.1943, § 79-2726;Laws 1949, c. 256, § 225, p. 765;R.S.1943, (1994), § 79-538;Laws 1996, LB 900, § 726.
